synonyms: ca—the word ca; avadhāraṇe—in emphasis; ihā—here; api—the word api; samuccaye—in the sense of an aggregate; dhṛtimanta—fully saturated; hañā—becoming; bhaje—worship; pakṣi-mūrkha-caye—dull creatures like the birds, the most foolish.
translation: "The word ca is for emphasis, and the word api is used as an aggregate. It is to be understood that even dull creatures [birds and illiterates] can also be situated in endurance and engage in Kṛṣṇa's devotional service.
